title: What can I ask Alexa on Fitbit smartwatches? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Charles: What can I ask Alexa on Fitbit smartwatches? Use Alexa on-the-go to start an exercise, get quick info and weather, set bedtime reminders and alarms, control your smart home devices and more—just by speaking to your watch. * Alexa exercise skill is available in English, German, Spanish, French, Italian and Japanese. Voice Assistant on Fitbit Smartwatches.

Alexa is a fantastic feature in Fitbit Smartwatches. Google Assistant is also expected to the compatible Fitbit Models soon. However, you can not ask everything to your Fitbit Alexa. As an example, you can see some suggestions of the Fitbit App as well as in the smartwatch under “Alexa.”  Hope it helps.
